```{r}
Sys.setenv(LANG = "en")
library(dplyr)
library(multiverse)
library(mverse)
```

```{r}
mv <- create_multiverse(soccer)
f <- formula_branch(height ~ meanIAT + weight, height ~ weight)
add_formula_branch(mv, f)
lm_mverse(mv)
summary(mv, output="df")
summary(mv, output="r")
```

```{r}
glm_mverse(mv, family=poisson())
summary(mv, output='de')
summary(mv, output='df')
summary(mv, output='aic')
summary(mv)
```

``` {r}
ttest_mverse(mv, x='height', y='nExp')
```

```{r}
mydf <- data.frame(
    x=rnorm(100, 0, 2),
    y=rnorm(100)
  )
mv <- create_multiverse(mydf)
mbranch <- mutate_branch(x + y, x - y, x * y, name = "m")
mv %>%
  add_mutate_branch(mbranch)
ttest_mverse(mv, 'x', 'm')

```
